# view

**Instance Property**

The view from which the view print formatter was derived.

## Declaration

```swift
var view: UIView { get }
```

## Discussion

You obtain a view print formatter by calling [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView/viewPrintFormatter()] on a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView] object.
title: view
